## How to Get Listed

Made a contribution? You'll be automatically added to this list when your PR is merged!

Contribution types include:
- ğŸ’» **Code** - Feature development, bug fixes
- ğŸ“– **Documentation** - Docs, tutorials, examples
- ğŸ› **Bug Reports** - Finding and reporting bugs
- ğŸ’¡ **Ideas** - Feature suggestions and discussions
- ğŸ§ª **Testing** - Writing or improving tests
- ğŸ¨ **Design** - UI/UX, mockups, graphics
- ğŸ”§ **Infrastructure** - CI/CD, Docker, K8s
- ğŸ“¢ **Advocacy** - Talks, blog posts, tutorials
